20110114180635.000|20110114180637.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, WHEN JEFFREY WAS BORN,

20110114180639.000|20110114180641.000|CC1|HE WAS BORN AT 5 1/2 MONTHS AND 
20110114180641.000|20110114180643.000|CC1|WADE A POUND AND 10 OUNCES.

20110114180656.000|20110114180657.000|CC1|PHRASE.

20110114180659.000|20110114180700.000|CC1|AND I DIDN'T REALLY KNOW WHAT   
20110114180700.000|20110114180701.000|CC1|THAT MEANT AS I'M SITTING THERE 
20110114180701.000|20110114180702.000|CC1|JUST CRYING.

20110114181405.000|20110114181408.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110114181408.000|20110114181409.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110114181409.000|20110114181410.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110114181410.000|20110114181410.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110114181410.000|20110114181414.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110114181414.000|20110114181414.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110114181414.000|20110114181417.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110114181417.000|20110114181417.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110114181417.000|20110114181420.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110114181420.000|20110114181420.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110114181420.000|20110114181420.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110114181420.000|20110114181423.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110114181423.000|20110114181423.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110114181423.000|20110114181426.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110114181426.000|20110114181426.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110114181426.000|20110114181428.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110114181428.000|20110114181428.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110114181428.000|20110114181431.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110114181431.000|20110114181431.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110114181431.000|20110114181432.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110114181432.000|20110114181432.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110114181432.000|20110114181435.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110114181435.000|20110114181435.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110114181435.000|20110114181437.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110114181437.000|20110114181437.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110114181437.000|20110114181440.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110114181440.000|20110114181440.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110114181440.000|20110114181442.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110114181442.000|20110114181442.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110114181442.000|20110114181445.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110114181445.000|20110114181446.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110114181446.000|20110114181446.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110114181446.000|20110114181448.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110114181448.000|20110114181448.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110114181448.000|20110114181451.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,
